translation.en: Doc, how pleased are you with Tiger King's depiction of you?
translation.it: Doc, quanto ti piace il ritratto che Tiger King fa di te?

translation.en: This is not a documentary.
translation.it: Questo non è un documentario.

translation.en: Not a documentary.
translation.it: Non è un documentario.

translation.en: It's fake. It's a silly fake show.
translation.it: È finto. È uno stupido show finto.

translation.en: An incredible wild ride of a fanticiful tale.
translation.it: Una grande cavalcata selvaggia sulla fantasia. UNA DOCUSERIE NETFLIX

translation.en: [John Reinke] Doc Antle hated Tiger King.
translation.it: Doc Antle odiava Tiger King.

translation.en: He thought he was misrepresented in a bunch of lies.
translation.it: Pensava di venir travisato dalle tante bugie.

translation.en: [Doc] They hid the fact that this facility is the Ritz-Carlton of keeping big cats.
translation.it: Non dicono che questa struttura è il Ritz-Carlton dei grandi felini.

translation.en: No one's even close to the grandeur and beauty of this facility.
translation.it: Nessun'altra si avvicina alla sua grandiosità e bellezza.

translation.en: [Joe Exotic] It's an illusion. He creates an illusion for people to believe.
translation.it: È un'illusione. Crea un'illusione a cui la gente crede.

translation.en: I haven't spoke to Doc since this came out but he's not happy about it.
translation.it: Non ho parlato a Doc da quando va in onda, ma non è contento.

translation.en: [Barbara Fisher] Doc is a very skilled con artist.
translation.it: Doc è un abilissimo truffatore.

translation.en: He thinks that he's smarter than the rest of the world
translation.it: Pensa di essere più intelligente del resto del mondo

translation.en: and he designs his environment around him to confirm that.
translation.it: e progetta l'ambiente intorno a lui per confermarlo.

translation.en: [Barbara] He creates his own truth always.
translation.it: Crea sempre la sua verità.

translation.en: [Barbara] He doesn't live in a world where people challenge him.
translation.it: Non vive in un mondo in cui la gente lo sfida.

translation.en: He doesn't-- He's not used to that anymore.
translation.it: Non ci è più abituato.

translation.en: The silly little girl Barbara Fisher, that bitch is on there talking, saying,
translation.it: Barbara Fisher, quella sciocca ragazzina stronza, è là a dire:

translation.en: "They forced me to get a boob job after a month." Like, are you mad?
translation.it: "Mi hanno costretta a rifarmi il seno dopo un mese". Sei fuori?

translation.en: She was obsessed with having boobs.
translation.it: Era ossessionata dalle tette!

translation.en: Those boobs didn't live here, she's living out there,
translation.it: Quelle tette non erano qui. Lei vive là fuori

translation.en: test driving them on every Tom, Dick, and Harry she can find.
translation.it: a testarle con ogni Tom, Dick e Harry che riesce a trovare.

translation.en: -That's why she's pregnant all the time. -Oh, fuck.
translation.it: - Ecco perché è sempre incinta. - Cazzo.

translation.en: In terms of what he said about me, it's pure misogyny, that's what it is.
translation.it: Ciò che ha detto di me è pura misoginia, ecco cos'è.

translation.en: [Barbara] Since Tiger King, we had people coming by the house, recognizing the dog.
translation.it: Dopo Tiger King la gente veniva a casa mia e riconosceva il cane.

translation.en: Just the fact that everybody probably could figure out where I lived
translation.it: Il fatto che tutti sapessero dove vivevo

translation.en: and that means Doc knew where I lived.
translation.it: significa che anche Doc lo sapeva.

translation.en: That was scary to me, so we just went out into the deep country
translation.it: Mi spaventava, così siamo andati nella campagna remota

translation.en: and that's where we remain.
translation.it: ed è lì che ora viviamo.

translation.en: [Barbara] Doc has gotten away with this for so long, he thinks he's bulletproof.
translation.it: Doc l'ha fatta franca così a lungo che pensa di essere inattaccabile.

translation.en: But after Tiger King, all these people contacted me with their own stories.
translation.it: Ma dopo Tiger King tante persone mi hanno contattato con le loro storie.

translation.en: I knew that if I came forward, other people would too.
translation.it: Sapevo che se mi fossi fatta avanti, mi avrebbero imitata.

translation.en: [Barbara] There is safety in numbers.
translation.it: C'è sicurezza nei numeri.

translation.en: [Barbara] Maybe he doesn't think that you'll look back into his past.
translation.it: E forse non pensa che si guarderà al suo passato.

translation.en: But what's going on with Doc won't survive in sunlight.
translation.it: Ma ciò che combina Doc non sopravviverà alla luce del sole.

translation.en: [guide] Good morning! It's nice and warm today, isn't it?
translation.it: Buongiorno! Fa caldo oggi, vero?

translation.en: -[crowd] Yeah! -[guide] Just a couple rules on it.
translation.it: Solo un paio di regole, ragazzi.

translation.en: No cameras are going to be allowed at all today.
translation.it: Oggi non saranno ammesse telecamere.

translation.en: This is your final warning.
translation.it: È l'ultimo avvertimento.

translation.en: If we see recording or taking pictures, you will be asked to leave.
translation.it: Se vediamo registrazioni o foto, vi verrà chiesto di andarvene.

translation.en: I'm Dr. Bhagavan Antle, director here at Myrtle Beach Safari.
translation.it: Sono il dr. Bhagavan Antle, presidente di Myrtle Beach Safari

translation.en: Myrtle Beach Safari is an incredible wildlife encounter
translation.it: dove si ha l'incredibile incontro con la fauna selvaggia

translation.en: where you get to have an up-close, interactive experience
translation.it: dove si vivono esperienze interattive e ravvicinate

translation.en: with a variety of incredible exotic animals
translation.it: con un'enorme varietà di animali esotici.

translation.en: up-close, uncaged and unbelievable interaction.
translation.it: Incredibili interazioni ravvicinate, in libertà.

translation.en: A handful of people in the world get to have an eagle living in your house.
translation.it: Pochi al mondo hanno un'aquila che vive in casa loro,

translation.en: Sitting on the glove watching Game of Thrones.
translation.it: appollaiata sul guanto guardando Il Trono di Spade.

translation.en: That doesn't happen a whole lot for a lot of people.
translation.it: Non succede spesso a molti.

translation.en: When I was 12 years old, I got a photo taken in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
translation.it: Quando avevo 12 anni, ho fatto una foto a Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.

translation.en: I looked at my mom and said, "This is what I want to do for the rest of my life."
translation.it: Guardai mia madre e dissi: "È ciò che voglio fare per sempre".

translation.en: And when senior year came around, I called up Doc Antle and I said,
translation.it: Quando frequentai l'ultimo anno, chiamai Doc Antle e dissi:

translation.en: "Please let me come volunteer for you,"
translation.it: "Fatemi fare la volontaria"

translation.en: and he said, "Well, how soon can you move here?"
translation.it: e lui: "Tra quanto puoi essere qui?"

translation.en: And it was like I'd gotten the golden ticket for American Idol.
translation.it: Ed era come se avessi ottenuto il biglietto d'oro per American Idol.

translation.en: I'm like, "Ah! Okay."
translation.it: Della serie: "Oh! Ok".

translation.en: [Jewels] I worked for Doc Antle for seven years.
translation.it: Ho lavorato per Doc Antle per sette anni.

translation.en: My parents were actually really happy that I was doing something that I believed I wanted to do.
translation.it: I miei erano davvero felici che facessi qualcosa in cui credevo.

translation.en: I don't think they realized what I was really signing up for,
translation.it: Non penso che abbiano capito in cosa mi stavo imbarcando,

translation.en: which is just 24/7 working at a place that I can't really leave.
translation.it: ovvero lavorare 24 ore su 24 in un posto che non si poteva lasciare.

translation.en: Barbara was the first person to come and talk to me.
translation.it: Barbara è stata la prima a parlare con me.

translation.en: Me and Barb focused a lot on training little cubs to become walking adolescents.
translation.it: Io e Barb addestravamo i cuccioli fino all'adolescenza.

translation.en: We would go to this place called Barefoot Landing every day,
translation.it: Andavamo ogni giorno a Barefoot Landing

translation.en: and we would do photos with tiger cubs and big cats.
translation.it: e scattavamo foto con cuccioli di tigre e grandi felini.

translation.en: [Shavit Perel] One summer, I went to call a friend of mine in Myrtle Beach,
translation.it: Un'estate chiamai un amico a Myrtle Beach

translation.en: and he offered me a job operating a climbing wall in Barefoot Landing.
translation.it: e mi offrì un lavoro come scalatore a Barefoot Landing.

translation.en: [Shavit] As the summer went on, I started developing relationships
translation.it: Col passare dell'estate, sviluppai relazioni

translation.en: with the people that worked at Preservation Station.
translation.it: col personale della Centrale di Salvaguardia.

translation.en: It started with Barbara, and then it was China.
translation.it: Prima con Barbara e poi è arrivata China.

translation.en: Everybody looked like Crocodile Dundee.
translation.it: Sembravano tutte Crocodile Dundee.

translation.en: And everybody was tan and blond and had a knife
translation.it: Tutte bionde, abbronzate, con un coltello.

translation.en: and it was really impressive.
translation.it: Era davvero impressionante.

translation.en: And then eventually Doc would show up.
translation.it: E alla fine arrivava Doc.

translation.en: He just blew me away.
translation.it: Mi lasciava a bocca aperta.

translation.en: By the time we reached the end of summer, he said, "How about you come work for me?"
translation.it: Alla fine dell'estate, chiese: "Che ne dici di venire a lavorare per me?"

translation.en: I said, "I'm in."
translation.it: E io risposi: "Ci sto".

translation.en: I stayed at the barn where the elephant was living.
translation.it: Vivevo nella stalla dell'elefante.

translation.en: So I would go to sleep with Bubbles and I would wake up with Bubbles.
translation.it: Andavo a dormire con Bubbles e mi svegliavo con Bubbles.

translation.en: Who the heck am I to be lucky enough to be in this position?
translation.it: Chi sono io per avere la fortuna di trovarmi in questa posizione?

translation.en: And then they would give me those clothes, and I got my knife.
translation.it: E poi mi hanno dato quei vestiti e il coltello.

translation.en: Now I'm looking like Crocodile Dundee, right? I'm the cool guy.
translation.it: Ora sembro Crocodile Dundee, vero? Sono proprio un figo.

translation.en: And it got to the point, like, I'm living a dream.
translation.it: E sono arrivato al punto di vivere un sogno.

translation.en: But everything completely turned on its head once Julie came into the picture.
translation.it: Ma tutto si è capovolto quando Julie è entrata in scena.

translation.en: I'm talking to Doc and he goes,
translation.it: Mentre parlo con Doc, lui fa:

translation.en: "I just want to let you know, there's a couple of new girls."
translation.it: "Sai, ci sono due ragazze nuove.

translation.en: "I don't want you getting involved."
translation.it: Non farti coinvolgere".

translation.en: Somebody told me, "Hey, Doc rated you a nine."
translation.it: Qualcuno mi ha detto: "Ehi, Doc ti ha dato un nove".

translation.en: Part of me was like, "Oh, yeah," and then part of me is like, "What?"
translation.it: Una parte di me pensava: "Ah, sì?" E un'altra: "Cosa?"

translation.en: [Magenta Brooks] Women and men at Doc's compound were treated very differently.
translation.it: Nella struttura di Doc, donne e uomini venivano trattati diversamente.

translation.en: He definitely showed off his giant bed a few more times than was necessary
translation.it: Ha sfoggiato il suo letto gigante più del necessario

translation.en: to do with an employee.
translation.it: trattandosi di dipendenti.

translation.en: I had always wondered if I had misread things,
translation.it: Mi sono sempre chiesta se avevo frainteso

translation.en: and then seeing Tiger King and hearing Barbara talk, it was so cathartic.
translation.it: e poi vedere Tiger King e sentire Barbara è stato liberatorio.

translation.en: It was just this amazing confirmation that I didn't make this up,
translation.it: È stata una grande conferma del fatto che non mi sono inventata niente

translation.en: and other people saw it too. [sighs]
translation.it: e che anche altri l'avevano notato.

translation.en: [Magenta] I am a polyamory relationship coach
translation.it: Sono coach di relazioni poliamorose

translation.en: and I've been noticing that people keep talking about Doc as being polyamorous.
translation.it: e ho notato che la gente considera Doc un poliamoroso.

translation.en: Polyamory requires respect that flows both ways.
translation.it: Il poliamore richiede rispetto in entrambe le direzioni.

translation.en: It requires autonomy.
translation.it: Richiede autonomia.

translation.en: And Doc is not encouraging his partners
translation.it: E Doc non incoraggia i suoi partner

translation.en: to create healthy relationships outside of him.
translation.it: a creare sane relazioni con altre persone, oltre a lui.

translation.en: -It's a harem, it's not polyamory. -[cryptic music plays]
translation.it: È un harem, non è poliamore.

translation.en: [Doc] I have my three beloved partners who've been with me for 20 years each.
translation.it: Ho avuto le mie tre amate partner con me per vent'anni ciascuna.

translation.en: My son, my three daughters.
translation.it: Mio figlio, le mie tre figlie.

translation.en: And that group of people, along with the peripheral characters around them,
translation.it: E quel gruppo di gente, insieme ai personaggi secondari attorno a loro,

translation.en: love doing this and plan on to continue to do it.
translation.it: amano fare ciò che fanno e vogliono continuare.

translation.en: So if I move to the Himalayan Mountains today,
translation.it: Quindi, se oggi mi trasferissi sull'Himalaya,

translation.en: those guys should be able to step up and run some facsimile of it.
translation.it: quei ragazzi saprebbero farsi avanti e gestire un fac-simile.

translation.en: [Magenta] He's got this very highly overinflated sense of self. He sees himself as kind of a guru.
translation.it: Ha un senso esagerato di sé. Si considera un guru.

translation.en: And so, having followers or having animals that are subservient to him
translation.it: E quindi, avere dei seguaci o degli animali sottomessi,

translation.en: kind of bolsters that narrative.
translation.it: rafforza quella narrazione.

translation.en: [Barbara] After we all changed our names, he gave a bunch of us different chains.
translation.it: Dopo averci cambiato nome, ci ha dato diverse collane.

translation.en: The medallion signified to all of us
translation.it: Il medaglione rappresentava per tutti noi

translation.en: this union of us all being one family.
translation.it: l'unione in una sola famiglia.

translation.en: It's a symbol for the integral yoga that Swami Satchidananda purported.
translation.it: È un simbolo dell'Integral Yoga voluto da Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: He was the guru that opened Woodstock.
translation.it: Fu il guru che parlò a Woodstock.

translation.en: A picture of the big bearded guy going, "Let's start." That's Swami Satchidananda.
translation.it: L'immagine del tizio barbuto che dice: "Cominciamo". È Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: [Doc] Tons of famous people are longtime devotees.
translation.it: Tantissime persone famose sono seguaci di lunga data.

translation.en: [Barbara] He met Swamiji Satchidananda in Yogaville.
translation.it: Ha incontrato Swamiji Satchidananda a Yogaville.

translation.en: [Barbara] All these people devoted to Swamiji and listening to everything he says,
translation.it: Tutte queste persone seguaci di Swamiji ascoltano ciò che dice

translation.en: and basing every aspect of their life around him.
translation.it: e basano ogni aspetto della loro vita intorno a lui.

translation.en: [Barbara] If there's somebody he idolized, it's Swamiji.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che idolatra, è Swamiji.

translation.en: The way he talks about him, it's beyond hero worship.
translation.it: Il modo in cui ne parla, va oltre l'adorazione dell'eroe.

translation.en: [man] How did you go from Yogaville to being a--
translation.it: Come sei passato da Yogaville a essere…

translation.en: [Doc] Once you add Yogaville, you're dropping in this incredibly complicated,
translation.it: Quando ti unisci a Yogaville, cadi in questa incredibilmente complicata

translation.en: cult-ridden, strange entity, like, "What?"
translation.it: entità strana, settaria, del tipo, cosa?

translation.en: [female voice] The Reverend Sri Swami Satchidananda
translation.it: Il reverendo Sri Swami Satchidananda

translation.en: experienced the spiritual oneness of all creation
translation.it: sperimentò l'unità spirituale dell'intera creazione

translation.en: and dreamed of creating a shrine where that oneness could be seen and felt.
translation.it: e sognò di realizzare un santuario in cui tale unità potesse essere vista e sentita.

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda used to always laughingly say
translation.it: Swami Satchidananda diceva sempre, ridendo,

translation.en: that the yoga institutes were asylums and we were all the inmates.
translation.it: che le scuole di yoga erano manicomi e che noi eravamo tutti internati.

translation.en: And people would go, "Ha-ha-ha. That's so funny, Swamiji."
translation.it: E la gente diceva: "Che divertente, Swamiji".

translation.en: But it was true. -We were having crisis times. -[tense music plays]
translation.it: Ma era vero. Stavamo attraversando una crisi.

translation.en: People were choosing between yoga and Scientology, and I thought,
translation.it: La gente sceglieva tra lo yoga e Scientology e io ho pensato:

translation.en: "I wasn't raised by wolves. I am going to go with yoga."
translation.it: "Non sono stata cresciuta dai lupi. Io scelgo lo yoga".

translation.en: [Satchidananda] Everywhere there seems to be the cry.
translation.it: Ovunque sembra esserci il grido.

translation.en: We hear people shouting in the name of peace,
translation.it: Sentiamo la gente gridare in nome della pace,

translation.en: but they want to fight for peace.
translation.it: ma vogliono combattere per la pace.

translation.en: Most of the people at Yogaville are loving, caring individuals,
translation.it: A Yogaville, la maggior parte è gente amorevole e premurosa

translation.en: who want to better themselves spiritually and want to better the world.
translation.it: che vuole migliorarsi spiritualmente e migliorare il mondo.

translation.en: [female voice] Yogaville is an intentional community where people choose to live together
translation.it: Yogaville è una comunità intenzionale in cui la gente sceglie di vivere insieme,

translation.en: practicing yoga, vegetarian diet, meditation.
translation.it: praticare yoga, la dieta vegetariana, la meditazione.

translation.en: There's probably close to 250 permanent residents.
translation.it: Ci sono circa 250 residenti permanenti.

translation.en: My parents met Swami Satchidananda when I was five years old,
translation.it: I miei hanno conosciuto Swami Satchidananda quando avevo cinque anni

translation.en: and I started meditating myself when I was 11, by choice.
translation.it: e ho iniziato a meditare quando ne avevo 11.

translation.en: I was doing, I don't know, four to six hours a day of yoga and meditation, yeah.
translation.it: Facevo yoga e meditazione dalle quattro alle sei ore al giorno.

translation.en: We were a very peaceful, loving, accepting…
translation.it: Eravamo una comunità molto pacifica, amorevole e accogliente.

translation.en: [female voice] People believe Swami Satchidananda is a god.
translation.it: La gente crede che Swami Satchidananda sia un dio.

translation.en: -A Jesus Christ. He can do no wrong. -[gentle music plays]
translation.it: Un Gesù Cristo. Non può sbagliare.

translation.en: They would drop to the ground when he walked into the room and bow to his feet.
translation.it: Quando entrava nella stanza, si prostravano e si inchinavano.

translation.en: Kiss his feet.
translation.it: Gli baciavano i piedi.

translation.en: [Sachi] I watched Tiger King, and I was like, "Damn." "They don't even know the story before that."
translation.it: Ho guardato Tiger King e ho pensato: "Non conoscono la storia dall'inizio".

translation.en: Doc Antle got ideas from Swami Satchidananda.
translation.it: Doc Antle ha preso le idee da Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: He was attracted to the power that he wielded over other people.
translation.it: Era attratto dal potere che esercitava sugli altri.

translation.en: Bhagavan was a very well-known character at Yogaville.
translation.it: Bhagavan era un personaggio molto noto a Yogaville.

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda loved him. He was, you know, lots of flash.
translation.it: Swami Satchidananda lo amava. Era brillante.

translation.en: He had Bubbles, the little baby elephant.
translation.it: Aveva Bubbles, l'elefantino.

translation.en: He was like a celebrity there.
translation.it: Era una celebrità lì.

translation.en: [female announcer] Bhagavan Antle of Bhagavan's Celestial Magic.
translation.it: Bhagavan Antle de La Magia Celeste di Bhagavan.

translation.en: [Joan] He was the cute boy of the '80s. He had long dark hair, a mustache.
translation.it: Era il tipico ragazzo carino anni '80. Aveva lunghi capelli scuri, i baffi.

translation.en: He was a magic man.
translation.it: Era un uomo magico.

translation.en: [Steven Diamond] The two of us had an instant connection through magic.
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto un legame istantaneo grazie alla magia.

translation.en: I was about 15 or 16.
translation.it: Io avevo 15 o 16 anni.

translation.en: I had my own career at that time, so I was doing fairs and festivals.
translation.it: All'epoca avevo una carriera, quindi organizzavo fiere e festival.

translation.en: And I was very popular all up and down the East Coast.
translation.it: Ero molto popolare nella East Coast.

translation.en: Bhagavan saw me as a great way to make some money.
translation.it: Bhagavan mi vedeva come un ottimo modo per fare soldi.

translation.en: [Steven] And so, right away we kind of formed this little informal partnership.
translation.it: E così, creammo subito una piccola collaborazione informale.

translation.en: A 50/50 plan was the deal.
translation.it: L'accordo era un progetto al 50/50.

translation.en: [Steven] Come down, guys! Run!
translation.it: Forza, piccoli! Correte!

translation.en: [Steven] He had this place called The Buckingham Zoological Park.
translation.it: Aveva un posto chiamato Parco Zoologico di Buckingham.

translation.en: Right outside of Yogaville.
translation.it: Appena fuori Yogaville.

translation.en: You'd drive down this little country road and you wouldn't know that it was there
translation.it: Guidavi lungo questa stradina e non ne conoscevi l'esistenza

translation.en: unless you knew exactly how to find it.
translation.it: se non sapevi esattamente come trovarlo.

translation.en: You walked through the little gate and you see this A-frame house.
translation.it: Attraversavi il cancello e vedevi questa casa a forma di A.

translation.en: It kind of looked like something a hobbit might live in.
translation.it: Sembrava la dimora di uno Hobbit.

translation.en: And immediately, as soon as you walked in, you could see an elephant in the distance,
translation.it: E, appena dentro, potevi vedere un elefante in lontananza

translation.en: and you could see tigers back there, you could see lions.
translation.it: e le tigri e i leoni.

translation.en: Good boy.
translation.it: Bravo ragazzo.

translation.en: [Steven] In the beginning, it was such a great place.
translation.it: All'inizio, era un posto fantastico.

translation.en: What I liked about the Buckingham Zoo was the community that Bhagavan had built.
translation.it: Ciò che mi piaceva dello Zoo di Buckingham era la comunità costruita da Bhagavan.

translation.en: [man] I met Bhagavan right out of high school.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto Bhagavan dopo il liceo.

translation.en: He would do local shows around here for schools.
translation.it: Faceva spettacoli locali per le scuole.

translation.en: And then I worked with him at the Renaissance Festival.
translation.it: Poi ho lavorato con lui al Festival del Rinascimento.

translation.en: [David] I made my living as a juggler for like 25 or 30 years.
translation.it: Ho fatto il giocoliere per 25 o 30 anni.

translation.en: [David] I'm sort of an entrepreneur.
translation.it: Sono una specie di imprenditore.

translation.en: I had a video business
translation.it: Avevo un'attività di videonoleggio

translation.en: and I used to videotape his magic show that he would perform.
translation.it: e filmavo il suo spettacolo di magia.

translation.en: By the constant practice of the control of the life force,
translation.it: Con la pratica costante del controllo della forza vitale,

translation.en: you will not only be able to control the life force of your mind and body,
translation.it: non solo potrete controllare la forza vitale di corpo e mente,

translation.en: you will also be able to control the life force of the universe, as well.
translation.it: ma potrete controllare la forza vitale dell'universo.

translation.en: [David] Bhagavan supposedly had psychic powers
translation.it: Bhagavan aveva presunti poteri psichici,

translation.en: because he had practiced yoga and his pranayama and acquired
translation.it: perché aveva praticato lo yoga, il pranayama e aveva acquisito

translation.en: these superpowers.
translation.it: tali super poteri.

translation.en: He would walk on coals and he would supposedly levitate things and whatnot.
translation.it: Camminava sui carboni ardenti e faceva levitare le cose e quant'altro.

translation.en: Your body can become so fit
translation.it: Il tuo corpo acquisisce una tale forma

translation.en: that you are immune to the outside world coming in and influencing you.
translation.it: da essere immune al mondo esterno che si insinua e ti influenza.

translation.en: [Steven] He would create this illusion that if you listened to him and you followed his ways,
translation.it: Creava l'illusione che se lo ascoltavi e seguivi la sua filosofia

translation.en: you would be able to do some of the same things.
translation.it: saresti stato in grado di fare le stesse cose.

translation.en: [David] These people getting paid almost nothing in promise of getting
translation.it: Le persone non venivano pagate se non con la promessa di ottenere super poteri da Bhagavan,

translation.en: these super powers from Bhagavan, when he didn't really have them himself.
translation.it: se non con la promessa di ottenere super poteri da Bhagavan, che era il primo a non averli.

translation.en: He was not a great magician.
translation.it: Non era un grande mago.

translation.en: [Doc] This is the Two of Hearts.
translation.it: Questo è il Due di Cuori.

translation.en: [David] Ninety-eight percent accuracy.
translation.it: Preciso al 98%.

translation.en: It was horrible. [laughs] I mean, it just-- It was horrible.
translation.it: Era terribile, davvero terribile.

translation.en: But people liked it because he was the cool guy with the tigers.
translation.it: Ma alla gente piaceva, perché era il figo con le tigri.

translation.en: These things are nothing in comparison to the accomplishments…
translation.it: Queste cose non sono niente in confronto ai risultati…

translation.en: of the thoughts-- of the control of the thoughts and emotions of the mind.
translation.it: dei pensieri… Del controllo dei pensieri ed emozioni della mente.

translation.en: They are but a drop in the ocean by comparison.
translation.it: In confronto, sono una goccia nell'oceano.

translation.en: The guru gave Bhagavan all of his teachings, the yoga teachings.
translation.it: Il guru insegnò a Bhagavan tutto sullo yoga.

translation.en: This philosophy and psychology of how to approach the world.
translation.it: Questa filosofia e psicologia su come affrontare il mondo.

translation.en: [Joy] I still love the yoga teachings,
translation.it: Amo ancora gli insegnamenti dello yoga,

translation.en: but the experience in retrospect
translation.it: ma l'esperienza in retrospettiva

translation.en: taught me so much about how
translation.it: mi ha insegnato tanto su come

translation.en: to be aware of a cult-type approach,
translation.it: essere consapevoli di un approccio di tipo settario,

translation.en: of wanting to attract people for the purpose of power or greed,
translation.it: e voler attrarre la gente per potere o avidità,

translation.en: and giving…
translation.it: dando…

translation.en: the feeling that you're going to receive something that isn't possible to get.
translation.it: la sensazione di ricevere qualcosa che non è possibile ottenere.

translation.en: [Joy] He had complete control.
translation.it: Aveva il controllo totale.

translation.en: We had to wear a certain type of clothing, we had to eat a certain type of food.
translation.it: Indossavamo un preciso abbigliamento, mangiavamo un certo tipo di cibo.

translation.en: I mean, you give everything.
translation.it: Cioè, dai tutto.

translation.en: You give not just your material possessions, but your whole belief system.
translation.it: Non solo i tuoi beni materiali, ma tutto il tuo sistema di convinzioni.

translation.en: One day, you'll be surprised how obedient your mind is.
translation.it: Un giorno, vi sorprenderete di quanto la vostra mente sia obbediente.

translation.en: One will have a body of all health and vitality, free from disease.
translation.it: Si avrà un corpo sano e vitale, libero da malattie.

translation.en: It will make the mind calm, clear, and dynamic.
translation.it: Renderà la mente calma, chiara e dinamica.

translation.en: [Joy] Bhagavan learned how to use the teachings in a manipulative way.
translation.it: Bhagavan ha imparato a usare gli insegnamenti in modo manipolativo.

translation.en: [Steven] To be part of the zoo,
translation.it: Per far parte dello zoo,

translation.en: you give up your entire life, you give up your name,
translation.it: rinunci alla tua vita, al tuo nome,

translation.en: you give up your world, you give up your family, your friends.
translation.it: al tuo mondo, alla tua famiglia, ai tuoi amici.

translation.en: The tigers become the first priority to the exclusion of everything else.
translation.it: Le tigri diventano la priorità, escludendo tutto il resto.

translation.en: And he's always been that way, and it's just a way of getting free labor.
translation.it: È sempre stato così ed è solo un modo per ottenere lavoro gratis.

translation.en: [guide] Being in the presence of a big cat can be a life-transforming event.
translation.it: Essere in presenza di un grande felino può cambiare la vita.

translation.en: When Doc started building his facility, he wanted to embody, like, a Yogaville type of environment,
translation.it: Quando Doc costruì la sua struttura voleva simulare l'ambiente di Yogaville,

translation.en: where he's, kind of, the leader of the group
translation.it: dove lui è il leader del gruppo

translation.en: and everyone's working for a greater cause, working with animals,
translation.it: e tutti lavoravano per il bene superiore, lavorando con gli animali

translation.en: and also incorporating yoga.
translation.it: e praticando lo yoga.

translation.en: [male interviewer] Do you practice yoga?
translation.it: Pratichi yoga?

translation.en: Cult, cult, cult alarm, um… [chuckles]
translation.it: Allarme setta!

translation.en: Myself, I have practiced yoga throughout my life, I've practiced…
translation.it: Io ho praticato yoga…

translation.en: Myself, I've practiced martial arts from the time I was very young. I've practiced throughout my life.
translation.it: Ho praticato arti marziali sin da piccolo. Mi sono esercitato tutta la vita.

translation.en: I always tell my staff that they should go and practice yoga
translation.it: Dico sempre al mio staff di praticare yoga,

translation.en: so they get a steadiness of mind and body.
translation.it: così da avere stabilità di mente e corpo.

translation.en: [Shavit] It makes so much sense to use those characteristics of the guru
translation.it: Ha molto senso usare le caratteristiche del guru

translation.en: to basically create a culture where you're like God.
translation.it: per creare una cultura in cui sei come Dio.

translation.en: [Doc] They come as teenagers and decades later they're still here,
translation.it: Arrivano da adolescenti e decenni dopo sono ancora qui,

translation.en: because there is a fulfillment from spending time with wildlife.
translation.it: perché' c'è appagamento nel passare del tempo con la fauna selvaggia.

translation.en: There's a song, "I'm on a vacation because I love my occupation."
translation.it: Una canzone fa: "È una vacanza perché amo la mia occupazione.

translation.en: "If you don't love what you're doing, change your station."
translation.it: Se non ami ciò che fai, cambia postazione".

translation.en: It's perfect. It's a perfect song.
translation.it: È la canzone perfetta.

translation.en: Bhagavan definitely had the desire to create his own following,
translation.it: Bhagavan desiderava creare il proprio seguito

translation.en: and he did and he was very good at it.
translation.it: e lo fece, era molto bravo.

translation.en: [Steven] I met Joe a couple times at his zoo.
translation.it: Ho incontrato Joe un paio di volte nel suo zoo

translation.en: and I was shocked at what I was seeing,
translation.it: ed ero scioccato da quello che vedevo,

translation.en: because in every way it was a poor man's version, it was a copy of what Bhagavan had built.
translation.it: perché era la copia, in versione povera, di quello costruito da Bhagavan.

translation.en: This is what we are going to create.
translation.it: Ecco cosa faremo.

translation.en: Press play.
translation.it: Premi play.

translation.en: [Joe] I want you to look at the landscaping here.
translation.it: Voglio che guardiate il paesaggio.

translation.en: One man does this entire park because he takes pride in it.
translation.it: Un uomo crea questo parco perché ne è orgoglioso.

translation.en: The staff take pride in what they do.
translation.it: Lo staff è orgoglioso di ciò che fa.

translation.en: Joe tried to make his park look exactly like Doc Antle's.
translation.it: Joe ha provato a rendere il suo parco identico a quello di Doc Antle.

translation.en: Everything was about Doc Antle.
translation.it: Tutto ruotava intorno a Doc Antle.

translation.en: We will buy safari-looking clothes
translation.it: Compreremo vestiti in stile safari,

translation.en: so you feel like you work in a jungle atmosphere.
translation.it: così vi sembrerà di lavorare in un'atmosfera da giungla.

translation.en: It's very simple, you get up in the morning, you get dressed,
translation.it: È molto semplice, vi alzate la mattina, vi vestite,

translation.en: you come to work with a shiny, sparkly attitude.
translation.it: venite al lavoro con un atteggiamento frizzante.

translation.en: [Joe] Until you can get some self-discipline, we can never do this.
translation.it: Finché non riuscite ad auto-disciplinarvi non ce la faremo mai.

translation.en: I have my own following and people. It's called the Temple of the Beast.
translation.it: Ho il mio seguito. Si chiama Tempio della Bestia.

translation.en: [Joe] We're a nondenominational church here at the G.W. Zoo, and I'm Pastor Joe.
translation.it: Siamo una chiesa aconfessionale al G.W.Zoo e io sono il pastore Joe.

translation.en: And if you would like to get married with tigers,
translation.it: E se volete sposarvi con le tigri,

translation.en: we can decorate and do it all
translation.it: possiamo organizzare il tutto…

translation.en: just for you.
translation.it: per voi.

translation.en: We are here today in the sanctuary of the Church of the Beast
translation.it: Siamo qui oggi, al santuario della Chiesa della Bestia

translation.en: where the sky is our ceiling and the grass is our floor.
translation.it: dove il cielo è il soffitto e l'erba è il pavimento.

translation.en: [Jewels] People like Joe Exotic and Doc Antle love dressing in costumes.
translation.it: Gente come Joe Exotic e Doc Antle adora travestirsi.

translation.en: That's their thing, that's what they love to do is boast,
translation.it: E ciò che amano fare è vantarsi.

translation.en: "I'm Tiger King with all these, you know, beautiful women around me
translation.it: "Sono il re delle tigri con tutte queste belle donne intorno

translation.en: that all have big boobs and all dressed in leather."
translation.it: dalle tette grosse e vestite di pelle."

translation.en: I can't believe I was actually okay with wearing those costumes.
translation.it: Non posso credere che mi piacesse indossare quei costumi.

translation.en: I think the one thing that I said absolutely not is not putting on tights.
translation.it: L'unica cosa a cui ho detto di no è mettere la calzamaglia.

translation.en: [Barbara] I've been deep into Bhagavan's closet before,
translation.it: Ho visto molto bene l'armadio di Bhagavan

translation.en: and you can find the most insane pieces of clothing.
translation.it: e puoi trovare gli abiti più assurdi.

translation.en: This is the Renaissance Fair outfit. I was proud of my chain mail halter top.
translation.it: Gli abiti della Fiera del Rinascimento. Ero orgogliosa della mia cotta di maglia.

translation.en: [male voice] King Richard's Faire! Weekends, September 4 through October 24.
translation.it: La Fiera di Re Riccardo! I week-end dal 4 settembre al 24 ottobre.

translation.en: [Steven] Renaissance Fairs are this gathering of thousands of people that come
translation.it: Le Fiere Rinascimentali sono un raduno di migliaia di persone,

translation.en: and all the performers and everybody that works at the fair,
translation.it: artisti e tutti coloro che lavorano alla fiera,

translation.en: they're all dressed up in these medieval type costumes.
translation.it: vestiti in stile medievale.

translation.en: And there's usually a swordsmith there, and there will be jugglers,
translation.it: Di solito c'è un fabbro, i giocolieri

translation.en: and there will be any type of performer that might have lived back in medieval times.
translation.it: e ogni tipo di artista che potesse vivere all'epoca medievale.

translation.en: Whenever we went to Renaissance Fairs, Bhagavan was kind of on the prowl,
translation.it: Quando andavamo alle Fiere Rinascimentali, Bhagavan era in agguato,

translation.en: searching for girls.
translation.it: in cerca di ragazze.

translation.en: There's no greater pick-up line in the world than, "Do you want to pet my tiger?"
translation.it: Non c'è miglior battuta per rimorchiare di: "Vuoi accarezzare la mia tigre?"

translation.en: [Magenta] That's how I met him.
translation.it: È così che l'ho conosciuto.

translation.en: I was traveling from state to state doing Renaissance Fairs
translation.it: Stavo viaggiando tra gli Stati facendo le Fiere Rinascimentali,

translation.en: and I was walking my ferret through the forest area
translation.it: portavo il mio furetto in giro per la foresta

translation.en: and ran smack into a guy walking a lion.
translation.it: e mi sono scontrata con un ragazzo con un leone.

translation.en: Right now, he is gaining almost a pound every single day.
translation.it: Sta mettendo su mezzo chilo al giorno.

translation.en: I said, "Do you ever hire people?"
translation.it: Ho chiesto: "Assumi gente?"

translation.en: And a week later I was hauling elephant poop. I had moved in.
translation.it: E una settimana dopo trasportavo cacca di elefante. Mi ero trasferita.

translation.en: [Magenta] He can talk a good game.
translation.it: È un gran chiacchierone.

translation.en: When he would talk about the requirements of the job,
translation.it: Quando parlava dei requisiti del lavoro,

translation.en: like how many hours we had to put in, how dedicated we had to be,
translation.it: tipo quante ore ci volevano, quanto dovevamo impegnarci,

translation.en: it really was framed in a very, you know,
translation.it: lui ripeteva:

translation.en: "These animals come first and it's going to be hard work and it's going to be difficult,
translation.it: "Gli animali vengono prima di tutto, sarà un lavoro duro, difficile

translation.en: and you've got to be strong to manage this." And that appealed to me greatly.
translation.it: e dovrete essere forti per farcela". Questo mi stimolava molto.

translation.en: [Joy] Bhagavan knew how to work people beautifully,
translation.it: Bhagavan sapeva lavorarsi le persone,

translation.en: because he got his beginnings of learning from Swami Satchidananda.
translation.it: perché aveva imparato da Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: [Joy] In order to be a Swami you take vows of celibacy,
translation.it: Per essere uno Swami bisogna fare voto di celibato,

translation.en: obedience, selfless service, and poverty.
translation.it: obbedienza, altruismo e povertà.

translation.en: He was Swami Satchidananda and he had taken those vows,
translation.it: Swami Satchidananda aveva fatto quei voti,

translation.en: but they didn't apply to him anymore because now he was enlightened.
translation.it: ma non li praticava più, perché ora era illuminato.

translation.en: Yoga expects one to reform himself.
translation.it: Lo yoga prevede che si migliori.

translation.en: [Joy] During the years that I was there, the guru had sexualized the relationship
translation.it: Durante gli anni in cui ero lì, il guru aveva sessualizzato il rapporto con molti dei suoi seguaci.

translation.en: with many of the disciples.
translation.it: il guru aveva sessualizzato il rapporto con molti dei suoi seguaci.

translation.en: [Joy] With any kind of sexual abuse,
translation.it: Con qualsiasi tipo di abuso sessuale,

translation.en: they bring you in, and they make you feel like you're going to be…
translation.it: vi coinvolge e vi fa sentire come se foste…

translation.en: …friends with this powerful person.
translation.it: amici di questa persona potente.

translation.en: So, what they would want gets changed.
translation.it: Quindi, ciò che vorreste viene cambiato.

translation.en: No, they wouldn't want an old man with a long beard
translation.it: No, non vorreste che un vecchio con la barba lunga

translation.en: to be fondling them and having intercourse with him.
translation.it: vi accarezzasse e facesse sesso.

translation.en: Jerking him off.
translation.it: Masturbandolo.

translation.en: [interviewer] How many women was he involved with?
translation.it: Con quante donne era coinvolto?

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. I bet there are some that never came forth.
translation.it: Non lo so. Scommetto che alcune non l'hanno mai detto.

translation.en: But I would say at least a dozen.
translation.it: Ma direi almeno una dozzina.

translation.en: [Joy] They believed that this made them special somehow,
translation.it: Credevano che questo le rendesse speciali

translation.en: that this close intimate relationship gave them
translation.it: che questa relazione intima desse loro

translation.en: a certain connection to God.
translation.it: una certa connessione con Dio.

translation.en: And Bhagavan was emulating the guru.
translation.it: E Bhagavan stava emulando il guru.

translation.en: [Joy] Women were very attracted to Bhagavan.
translation.it: Le donne erano molto attratte da Bhagavan.

translation.en: [Sumati] His first wife was "Brahmi" Betsy.
translation.it: La sua prima moglie fu Brahmi Betsy.

translation.en: There was, you know, only "Brahmi" for a little while on her own.
translation.it: Per un po' c'è stata solo Brahmi.

translation.en: [Joan] "Brahmi" was a beautiful woman.
translation.it: Era una donna bellissima.

translation.en: [Glen] She was beautiful. Slender, long dark hair.
translation.it: Era bellissima. Snella, lunghi capelli scuri.

translation.en: [David] They seemed like a happy married couple, in a sense.
translation.it: Sembravano, in un certo senso, una felice coppia di sposi

translation.en: And Bhagavan used to use them as an example about how happy they were
translation.it: che Bhagavan usava come esempio di quanto fossero felici

translation.en: and what a wonderful couple they were, which is sort of interesting.
translation.it: e che coppia meravigliosa fossero, il che è interessante.

translation.en: I think it was not her lifestyle.
translation.it: Non era il suo stile di vita.

translation.en: You know, Bhagavan being interested in multiple women.
translation.it: Vedere Bhagavan interessato a più donne.

translation.en: [man] I have to believe that's part of why my sister is where she's at now in her life.
translation.it: Credo sia parte del motivo per cui mia sorella si trovi in questo stato.

translation.en: I mean, it has to be.
translation.it: Dev'essere così.

translation.en: She never dealt with it.
translation.it: Non l'ha mai affrontato.

translation.en: And she's just been destroying her life, slowly but surely.
translation.it: E sta distruggendo la sua vita, lentamente ma inesorabilmente.

translation.en: [Glen] She's had a problem with drinking for a long time.
translation.it: Ha avuto problemi con l'alcol per molto tempo.

translation.en: She almost died a few years ago.
translation.it: È quasi morta qualche anno fa.

translation.en: It's a shame because she's--
translation.it: È un peccato perché è…

translation.en: [sighs] I'm getting emotional.
translation.it: Mi sto commuovendo.

translation.en: [Betsy] I'll probably never get over it. My mother always likes to bring that up.
translation.it: Probabilmente non lo supererò mai. Mia madre ne parla sempre.

translation.en: She goes, "He was the love of your life." I'm like, "Yeah, he was."
translation.it: Dice: "Era l'amore della tua vita". E io: "Sì, lo era".

translation.en: Nobody's ever gonna change that.
translation.it: Nessuno cambierà questo.

translation.en: [Betsy] Me and Kevin, that was his name back then, I met him in high school.
translation.it: Io e Kevin, si chiamava così all'epoca, ci siamo conosciuti alle superiori.

translation.en: And before we started dating, my boyfriend lived next door to him.
translation.it: E prima di metterci insieme, il mio ragazzo viveva accanto a lui.

translation.en: So I used to go to Kevin's house to spend time with my boyfriend,
translation.it: Quindi andavo a casa sua per stare con il mio ragazzo,

translation.en: 'cause Kevin's mother didn't care.
translation.it: perché alla madre di Kevin non importava.

translation.en: She was like, "Cool Mom."
translation.it: Era una: "Mamma fica".

translation.en: But, he broke up with me so that he could be with Kevin's mother.
translation.it: Ma mi ha lasciata per stare con la madre di Kevin.

translation.en: [interviewer] Didn't people think it was strange
translation.it: La gente non trovava strano che facesse sesso

translation.en: that she started having sex with your teenage boyfriend?
translation.it: La gente non trovava strano che facesse sesso con il tuo ragazzo?

translation.en: Only the people that knew about it, which was only us.
translation.it: Solo le persone che lo sapevano, cioè solo noi.

translation.en: She felt bad because she said, "Well, I know you're upset about this."
translation.it: Lei ci stava male perché diceva: "So che sei triste per questo.

translation.en: "Why don't you try dating Kevin?"
translation.it: Perché non provi a uscire con Kevin?"

translation.en: Meaning her son. And I did.
translation.it: Cioè suo figlio. E l'ho fatto.

translation.en: [Betsy] Of course I fell in love.
translation.it: Ovviamente, mi sono innamorata.

translation.en: I wanted to be with him all the time.
translation.it: Volevo stare sempre con lui.

translation.en: [Betsy] He was very confident and really beautiful.
translation.it: Era molto sicuro di sé e molto bello.

translation.en: [Glen] My sister used to bring him to the house.
translation.it: Mia sorella lo portava a casa.

translation.en: I don't think my dad liked him a lot in the beginning.
translation.it: Non credo piacesse molto a mio padre.

translation.en: I know Kevin dropped out of high school, maybe that was part of it.
translation.it: Forse perché Kevin aveva lasciato il liceo.

translation.en: But he had long hair. [laughs]
translation.it: Ma aveva i capelli lunghi. E questo a mio padre…

translation.en: That was-- My dad didn't really like that.
translation.it: Ma aveva i capelli lunghi. E questo a mio padre… non piaceva.

translation.en: [Betsy] Oh, he was a rebel.
translation.it: Era un ribelle.

translation.en: He always wanted to be in trouble.
translation.it: Voleva sempre finire nei guai.

translation.en: He actually sought out trouble. [chuckles]
translation.it: In realtà se li cercava.

translation.en: [Betsy] After we got married, we changed our names
translation.it: Dopo esserci sposati, abbiamo cambiato nome

translation.en: because we went to this one-month retreat at Yogaville
translation.it: perché abbiamo partecipato al ritiro di Yogaville

translation.en: to become certified yoga instructors.
translation.it: per diventare istruttori di yoga.

translation.en: And Swami Satchidananda gave us a new name.
translation.it: E Swami Satchidananda ci ha cambiato nome.

translation.en: I went from Betsy to Brahmi.
translation.it: Io, da Betsy a Brahmi.

translation.en: And he went from Kevin Antle to Sri Mahatmayavi Bhagavan Antle.
translation.it: E lui da Kevin Antle a Sri Mahatmayavi Bhagavan Antle.

translation.en: Pretty big change.
translation.it: Un bel cambiamento.

translation.en: [Sumati] Bhagavan Antle in 1982 was very good-looking.
translation.it: Bhagavan Antle nel 1982 era molto bello.

translation.en: He was very charming.
translation.it: Molto affascinante.

translation.en: He had a lot of bling, you know, he drove a DeLorean and a Porsche.
translation.it: Aveva un sacco di gioielli, guidava una DeLorean e una Porsche.

translation.en: [Sumati] I first met him in the Lotus Lake,
translation.it: L'ho incontrato per la prima volta al Lago del Loto,

translation.en: which is a lake around the Lotus Temple in Yogaville.
translation.it: il lago attorno al Tempio del Loto a Yogaville.

translation.en: I remember it very clearly
translation.it: Me lo ricordo bene,

translation.en: because he hit on several of the teenage girls that day in the lake.
translation.it: perché ci ha provato con molte ragazze quel giorno al lago

translation.en: and I talked to them about it and asked them like,
translation.it: e ne ho parlato con loro, chiedendo:

translation.en: "Did he touch your butt or boobs?"
translation.it: "Vi ha toccato il sedere o le tette?

translation.en: "I mean, did that happen to you guys too, or was it just me?"
translation.it: È successo anche a voi, o solo a me?"

translation.en: [interviewer] How old was he?
translation.it: Quanti anni aveva?

translation.en: He was 22, yeah, and I was 14.
translation.it: Lui aveva 22 anni, sì, e io 14.

translation.en: [Sumati] That's not legal in the state of Virginia.
translation.it: Non è legale nello stato della Virginia.

translation.en: He spent a long time, he spent, like, six months
translation.it: Ha passato molto tempo, tipo sei mesi

translation.en: sending me poetry, getting me flowers, just really wooing me.
translation.it: a mandarmi poesie, a portarmi fiori, a corteggiarmi.

translation.en: [Sachi] I remember having some outings with Bhagavan,
translation.it: Ricordo di essere uscita con Bhagavan,

translation.en: you know, to the movies, or, you know, out to dinner.
translation.it: andavamo al cinema o fuori a cena.

translation.en: He had all the toys. I remember playing with a lot of toys.
translation.it: Aveva molti giochi. Ricordo di averci giocato.

translation.en: They had a Jacuzzi. We'd play with the baby animals a lot.
translation.it: Avevano una Jacuzzi. Giocavamo molto con i cuccioli.

translation.en: When you were over there, you were in his world.
translation.it: Quando eri lì, eri nel suo mondo.

translation.en: [Sachi] I minimized everything that went on,
translation.it: Ho minimizzato tutto ciò che è successo,

translation.en: but now that I look at it as an adult,
translation.it: ma ora che lo guardo da adulta,

translation.en: I was kind of passed on…
translation.it: sono stata tipo concessa…

translation.en: to a person who worked with Bhagavan.

translation.en: with "Brahmi" Betsy, his first wife, which was really awkward for me
translation.it: con Brahmi, Betsy la sua prima moglie, ed è stato davvero imbarazzante per me,

translation.en: But she was really young and I can imagine that she would've believed him, of course.

translation.en: [Sumati] He did one of those power and control maneuvers where he isolated me.
translation.it: Ha fatto una di quelle manovre di potere e controllo, isolandomi.

translation.en: I moved out of my parents' house at 15 and moved on to the Yogaville property.

translation.en: He would come and visit me in my tent in Yogaville sometimes.

translation.en: [Betsy] He was only interested in me as long as I looked like I was 12.

translation.en: That's what he liked, he liked women who looked like they were still teenagers.

translation.en: [Magenta] You needed to be very, very thin.

translation.en: I was eating Doc's very restricted diet, so I was eating around 800 calories a day.
translation.it: Seguivo la dieta di Doc, quindi mangiavo 800 calorie al giorno.

translation.en: A very nutrient-light food.

translation.en: [Doc] You cannot make someone into an animal trainer.

translation.en: one needs to have a physicality of timing and understanding.
translation.it: avere prestanza fisica, tempismo e consapevolezza.

translation.en: [Magenta] I was starving.

translation.en: I was blacking out when I stood up.

translation.en: I almost got killed because you're working with wild animals and you…
translation.it: Ho rischiato di morire lavorando con animali selvaggi e…

translation.en: My blood pressure was so low, I'd stand up and start to black out.
translation.it: Avevo la pressione così bassa che quando mi alzavo, svenivo.

translation.en: One of the volunteers saved me.
translation.it: Mi ha salvato una volontaria.

translation.en: She had been taken out for her birthday, and she comes back to me the next day,
translation.it: Era stata fuori per il suo compleanno e il giorno dopo è venuta da me

translation.en: and she says, "You don't know what's happening to you." "You're being brainwashed."
translation.it: e mi ha detto: "Non sai cosa ti succede. Ti fanno il lavaggio del cervello.

translation.en: "This is what cults do when they're taking over people's psyches."
translation.it: È ciò che fanno le sette quando prendono il controllo della psiche della gente."

translation.en: And she says, "You've been doing this for so long,
translation.it: E poi: "È da così tanto tempo che lo fai

translation.en: you don't even know how off your brain is right now."
translation.it: da non renderti conto che il tuo cervello non funziona".

translation.en: [Magenta] So, she says, "You have to eat."

translation.en: My brain started working a little better, and I went to Doc
translation.it: Il mio cervello ha cominciato a funzionare meglio e sono andata da Doc

translation.en: and I was like, "I want to stay for the next year."
translation.it: dicendo: "Voglio stare il prossimo anno".

translation.en: I was going to finish up my two-year thing.

translation.en: But I decided I didn't want the boob job. I decided that wasn't who I wanted to be.

translation.en: And he said, "If you're gonna look like a fat ass, you don't need the tits."

translation.en: I mean, I was still skeletal, I was still concave,
translation.it: Ero ancora scheletrica, concava

translation.en: and I thought, "Oh, I'm never going to win this game."

translation.en: "And I'm starting to believe him."

translation.en: [Magenta] I felt like if I stayed, I was going to be subsumed.

translation.en: [Doc] In the '80s when we started out, Swami Satchidananda had a new idea that was really fresh,
translation.it: Negli anni '80, quando abbiamo iniziato, Swami Satchidananda ha avuto l'idea

translation.en: that what you act like, what you think, what you eat, shapes your health.
translation.it: che ciò che fai, ciò che pensi e ciò che mangi, modellino la tua salute.

translation.en: You are what you eat. Please remember that.
translation.it: Siete quello che mangiate. Ricordatelo.

translation.en: Most of our physical problems are caused by our food that we eat.
translation.it: La maggior parte dei problemi fisici sono causati dal cibo che mangiamo.

translation.en: Swami led you to believe that he was…
translation.it: Swami ti faceva credere d'essere…

translation.en: now an enlightened being and a perfect instrument of God.
translation.it: una creatura illuminata e un perfetto strumento di Dio.

translation.en: [Joy] Bhagavan saw the guru as someone that could get away with everything.

translation.en: Stop. Oh no! Flippity-floppity. You big old guy.

translation.en: -We're trying to not let you film. -[cameraman] Sorry. Okay.

translation.en: -[eerie music plays] -I loved this one capuchin monkey.

translation.en: I mean, she's a little tiny baby

translation.it: Prima dell'apertura del Tempio del Loto,

translation.it: All'improvviso, la comunità decise che ogni studente, genitore e insegnante

translation.en: People of the opposite sex would not be in the same room together alone.
translation.it: Uomini e donne non potevano stare soli nella stessa stanza.

translation.en: And if a parent, a child, or a teacher was unwilling to sign the pledge,
translation.it: E se un genitore, un bambino o un insegnante non firmavano l'accordo,

translation.en: they couldn't attend or teach at the school.
translation.it: non potevano frequentare o insegnare.

translation.en: I didn't want to sign it.
translation.it: Io non volevo firmare.

translation.en: When I spoke out, the community
translation.it: Quando l'ho detto la comunità…

translation.en: asked me to leave.
translation.it: mi ha cacciato.

translation.en: [Sachi] Swami Satchidananda told me directly.
translation.it: Me l'ha detto Swami Satchidananda.

translation.en: He was like, "You're a rotten apple."
translation.it: Ha detto: "Sei una mela marcia.

translation.en: "You're going to make the other shiny, bright apples rotten, too."
translation.it: Farai marcire anche le altre mele lucenti".

translation.en: [Sachi] Being excommunicated and shunned was painful.
translation.it: Essere scomunicata ed evitata è stato doloroso.

translation.en: My whole world was Yogaville. I didn't know anything else.
translation.it: Tutto il mio mondo era Yogaville. Non sapevo nient'altro.

translation.en: Yogaville failed our kids
translation.it: Yogaville ha deluso i nostri ragazzi

translation.en: by not taking a stand.
translation.it: non prendendo posizione.

translation.en: By the time I got pregnant,
translation.it: Quando sono rimasta incinta,

translation.en: he was already in a relationship with another 14-year-old.
translation.it: aveva già una relazione con un'altra quattordicenne.

translation.en: Once you've married a 14-year-old… [scoffs]
translation.it: Quando sposi una quattordicenne,

translation.en: …what could possibly…
translation.it: cos'altro potrebbe…

translation.en: hold you back?
translation.it: trattenerti?

translation.en: [Radha Hirsch] Never in a million years
translation.it: Mai, in un milione di anni,

translation.en: did I ever think I would be sharing this story publicly. [laughs]
translation.it: avrei pensato di condividere questa storia pubblicamente.

translation.en: When I hear myself, I'm like, "Wow, it is pretty crazy."
translation.it: Quando mi sento, dico "Wow, è pazzesco".

translation.en: I was 14 and he was 25.
translation.it: Io avevo 14 anni e lui 25.

translation.en: My mom was wanting me to realize how inappropriate the situation was.
translation.it: Mia madre voleva che capissi quanto fosse inopportuna la situazione.

translation.en: And I remember him saying,
translation.it: E ricordo che lui disse:

translation.en: "Don't worry, we're going to deal with it. It's all going to work out." "Don't worry. We're going to be together."
translation.it: "Non preoccuparti, lo affronteremo. Andrà tutto bene. Staremo insieme".

translation.en: Bhagavan and I were talking on the phone
translation.it: Bhagavan e io parlavamo al telefono,

translation.en: and he wanted me to give him very specifically my route to school.
translation.it: e mi ha chiesto di descrivergli precisamente il percorso per la scuola.

translation.en: We went over it and over it, and he came and pulled up next to me
translation.it: L'abbiamo ripetuto più e più volte. È arrivato e ha accostato

translation.en: in a disguise of some sort.
translation.it: sotto mentite spoglie.

translation.en: He looked bizarre, like all the hair up in a hat and like, crazy funky glasses.
translation.it: Aveva un aspetto bizzarro, i capelli nascosti in un berretto e strani occhiali.

translation.en: And I jump in the car, I dumped my book bags in a dumpster
translation.it: Sono saltata in macchina, ho buttato la cartella in un cassonetto

translation.en: and we flew off.
translation.it: e siamo volati via.

translation.en: In my mind, I ran away, yes, but I still, kind of, wasn't thinking
translation.it: Nella mia mente, sono scappata, sì, ma ancora non pensavo

translation.en: that it was really an abduction.
translation.it: che in realtà fosse un rapimento.
